common.title: Open Corridor
common.description: Search over 20,000 tables extracted from 37 pipeline applications and their Environmental and Socio-Econonmic Assesments - the start of something new, at the Canada Energy Regulator.

page1.title: The Project
page1.description: The opportunity of a legacy, driven by policy - and our plans for the future.

page2.title: The Data
page2.description: An introduction to Environmental and Socio-Economic Assessments ("ESA's")

page3.title: The Methods
page3.description: Learn how we turned regulatory documents into structured data.

filterPanel.title: Search by one or many of the filter options below.

treeMap.title: Select a box to filter by project and access project details.
